IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zyzj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_qzjj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_qtgdzbj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) AS bnzbjtotal,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_yhjk,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_xt,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_jj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and SUBSTR(tb1.period_value, 1 , 4) = YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(#{param1.periodValue},'%Y%m')) ),0) AS bnrztotal,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zyzj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_qzjj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_qtgdzbj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) AS ljzbjtotal,
IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_yhjk,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_xt,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) + IFNULL((SELECT SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_jj,0)) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.period_value <= #{param1.periodValue} ),0) AS ljrztotal FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk t1 INNER JOIN pro_inv_com_inf t2 ON t2.inv_pro_id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN pro_inv_basic t3 ON t3.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t3.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN pro_inv_ht_info t4 ON t4.inv_pro_id = t1.inv_pro_id and t4.del_flag = '0' INNER JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t5 ON t5.project_id = t3.project_id and t5.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN pro_inv_xmtzqk t6 ON t6.inv_pro_id = t1.inv_pro_id and t6.del_flag = '0' AND t6.period_value = #{param1.periodValue}
t1.del_flag = '0'
and t1.period_value = #{param1.periodValue}
and t5.project_id = #{param1.proId,jdbcType=CHAR}
and t5.project_id = #{param1.projectId,jdbcType=CHAR}
and t5.project_id in (${param1.projectIdSql})
ORDER BY CAST(sort1 AS DECIMAL),pro_no

SELECT t3.id, t4.project_id AS proId, t4.pro_no AS pro_num, t4.company_name AS comname, t4.project_name AS pro_name, t3.create_date, t3.period_value FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t4 INNER JOIN pro_inv_basic t1 ON t1.project_id = t4.project_id INNER JOIN pro_inv_com_inf t2 ON t2.inv_pro_id = t1.id INNER JOIN pro_inv_xmzjqk t3 ON t3.inv_pro_id = t1.id
t4.del_flag = '0'
and t4.project_id = #{projectId}
and t4.project_id in (${projectIdSql})
ORDER BY t3.period_value DESC

SELECT t2.project_id, TRUNCATE(IFNULL(amount1,0)/10000,2) AS ztze, TRUNCATE(( IFNULL(zjxqqk_zyzj,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_qzjj,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_qtgdzbj,0) )/10000,2) AS zbjtotal, ( IFNULL(zjxqqk_zyzj,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_qzjj,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_qtgdzbj,0) ) /amount1 AS zbjbl,
TRUNCATE(( IFNULL(zjxqqk_yhjk,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_xt,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_jj,0) )/10000,2) AS rztotal, ( IFNULL(zjxqqk_yhjk,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_xt,0) + IFNULL(zjxqqk_jj,0) ) /amount1 AS rzbl,
TRUNCATE(IFNULL(zjxqqk_zfbt,0)/10000,2) zjxqqk_zfbt, IFNULL(zjxqqk_zfbt,0) /amount1 AS zfbtbl,
TRUNCATE(IFNULL(zjxqqk_qtzj,0)/10000,2) zjxqqk_qtzj, IFNULL(zjxqqk_qtzj,0) /amount1 AS qtzjbl
,(SELECT TRUNCATE ( IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tb1.bqdwzj_zyzj,0)),0)/ 10000, 2 ) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id and tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb2.project_id = t3.project_id and tb1.del_flag = '0' and tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) AS ljdwzj_zyzj,
(SELECT TRUNCATE(SUM(IFNULL(money,0))/10000,2) FROM pro_inv_xmzjjgtz t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t1.money_category = '5.0' and t2.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) AS jsqzbyz_xmkl_jsqzjhb,
IFNULL(t2.zbjzykhzb,0) AS zbjzykhzb,
((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zyzj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zbjygjrgjj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_ygjrgjj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(money,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjjgtz t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t1.money_category = '5.0' and t2.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) ) /(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) as sjtrzyzj_ztzzebl
FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN zj_tz_pro_manage t3 ON t3.project_id = t2.project_id and t3.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t1.period_value = date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')
and t2.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(zbjzykhzb,0) FROM pro_inv_basic WHERE del_flag = '0' and project_id = t3.project_id) AS zbjzykhzb,
((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zyzj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_zbjygjrgjj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) + (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(bqdwzj_ygjrgjj,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjqk tb1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic tb2 ON tb2.id = tb1.inv_pro_id AND tb2.del_flag = '0' WHERE tb1.del_flag = '0' AND tb2.project_id = t3.project_id AND tb1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m')) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(money,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmzjjgtz t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t1.money_category = '5.0' and t2.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) ) /(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tzwcbq,0)),0) FROM pro_inv_xmtzqk t1 LEFT JOIN pro_inv_basic t2 ON t2.id = t1.inv_pro_id and t2.del_flag = '0'
t1.del_flag = '0' and t2.project_id = t3.project_id and t1.period_value <= date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') ) as sjtrzyzj_ztzzebl, t3.project_id FROM zj_tz_pro_manage t3
t3.del_flag = '0' AND t3.project_type = '0'
